document.full_text: pressure mounted on sunday for unpopular prime minister naoto kan to step down soon and even a senior member of his own party warned the lameduck leader not to stay in office much longer.
document.title: pressure mounts on japan pm to quit amid coalition talk
lines_and_colors: pressure mounted on sunday for unpopular prime minister naoto kan to step down soon and even a senior member of his own party warned the lameduck leader not to stay in office much longer.
